thought: To craft a black_concrete_powder I need to craft a black_dye first. To craft a black_dye I need to place an ink_sac in the crafting table. I will move the ink_sac from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
